metadata.title: CVE-2024-42272 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:sched: act_ct: take care of padding in struct zones_ht_keyBlamed commit increased lookup key size from 2 bytes to 16 bytes,because zones_ht_key got a struct net pointer.Make sure rhashtable_lookup() is not using the padding byteswhich are not initialized. BUG: KMSAN: uninit-value in rht_ptr_rcu include/linux/rhashtable.h:376[inline] BUG: KMSAN: uninit-value in __rhashtable_lookupinclude/linux/rhashtable.h:607 [inline] BUG: KMSAN: uninit-value in rhashtable_lookupinclude/linux/rhashtable.h:646 [inline] BUG: KMSAN: uninit-value in rhashtable_lookup_fastinclude/linux/rhashtable.h:672 [inline] BUG: KMSAN: uninit-value in     by updating your system to the following package versions:
